mapper.select: SELECT ts.courseDesignReportStore, si.studentName FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent ts JOIN t_student_base_info si ON ts.studentID = si.studentID WHERE ts.courseDesignTeacherStudentID = #{courseDesignTeacherStudentID}

SELECT ts.checkStatus, ts.checkAdvice, ti.teacherName FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent ts JOIN t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta ON ts.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID = ta.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ti.teacherID = ta.teacherID WHERE ts.courseDesignTeacherStudentID = #{courseDesignTeacherStudentID}

SELECT ia.courseDesignName, ia.courseDesignNum, ti.teacherName, ti.teacherNum FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent ts JOIN t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta ON ts.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID = ta.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ta.teacherID = ti.teacherID JOIN t_courseDesign_info_arrange ia ON ta.courseDesignArrangeID = ia.courseDesignArrangeID WHERE ts.courseDesignTeacherStudentID = #{courseDesignTeacherStudentID}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent SET courseDesignReportName = #{courseDesignReportName}, courseDesignReportStore = #{courseDesignReportStore}, uploadTime = #{uploadTime}, uploadStatus = #{uploadStatus} WHERE courseDesignTeacherStudentID = #{courseDesignTeacherStudentID}
